title: Elon Musk's inner circle
description: 'Elon has an inner circle of friends and family that he keeps close,' Tim Higgins, author of 'Power Play: Elon Musk, Tesla, and the Bet of the Century,' told the Evening Standard. The billionaire often drafts these friends into new business ventures with some already appearing at Twitter, Higgins said.

title: Tech CEO says he was hit with up to $30,000 in surprise taxes
description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In), the country's cyber security agency, has a warning. In an advisory, CERT-In said a new mobile banking 'Trojan' virus, SOVA, which can stealthily encrypt an Android phone for ransom and is hard to uninstall is targeting Indian customers.

title: If you use your Android mobile for banking in India...

title: We could be waiting a while for the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: There was a gap of 18 months between the launch of the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and the Samsung Galaxy Tab S8, and if a new report is to be believed then it's going to be the same sort of wait for the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9.
